word: 4. THE BEAST WITH TWO HORNS, REVELATION 13:11-17, IS IN A DIFFERENT LOCALITY, "COMING UP OUT OF THE EARTH;" NOT BY THE CONQUEST OF NATIONS AND PEOPLES, BUT GROWING AS A PLANT, OUT OF THE EARTH. THIS REPRESENTS THE UNITED STATES, A LOCALITY OUTSIDE OF THE DOMINION OF "ALL THE WORLD," AS KNOWN TO THE ANCIENTS.
